about: Hi! I'm Anirudhan, a passionate front-end developer dedicated to crafting seamless and visually appealing web experiences. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React and Vue.js, I bring designs to life with clean and efficient code.I have a keen eye for detail and love blending creativity with functionality to build responsive, user-friendly interfaces. Whether it's developing pixel-perfect websites, optimizing performance, or collaborating with teams to create impactful digital solutions, I thrive on solving complex challenges.When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring design trends, diving into open-source projects, or experimenting with new tools and technologies to stay ahead in the ever-evolving world of web development.
